content:
Assign skills to your agents as the expertise of your team evolves.

Available in: Performance Editions and in Developer Edition orgs that were created after June 14, 2012. Also available in Unlimited Edition and Enterprise Edition with Service Cloud.

To assign skills: Assign Chat Skills to Users OR Customize Application.

The legacy chat product is scheduled for retirement on February 14, 2026, and is in maintenance mode until then. Before assigning a user or profile to a skill, chat must be enabled. 

In Setup, enter Skills in the Quick Find box, then select Skills.
Click the name of the skill you want to assign.
Click Edit.
Select either the profiles (recommended) or individual users who have this skill.
Click Save.

Skills are visible to all users, but only your administrator can create skills.

To accept a chat that requires skills, an agent must have all skills assigned to the chat. These skills can be assigned via the routing configuration, skills-based routing rules, or an Omni-Channel flow.
title: Assigning Skills to Service Cloud Agents
